    • verifyLength

      public static boolean verifyLength(String stringInput, int low)
      Method to check if the length of the input string is more than low but no maximum limit.
      Parameters:
      stringInput - : The input string to check the length of.
      low - : The minimum inclusive value the stringInput must have
      Returns:
      true if the length of the stringInput is more than the low given. False otherwise.

    • verifyLength

      public static boolean verifyLength(String stringInput, int low, int high)
      Method to check if the length of the input string is between the low and high inputs.
      Parameters:
      stringInput - : The input string to check the length of.
      low - : The minimum inclusive value the stringInput must have
      high - : The maximum inclusive value the stringInput must have
      Returns:
      true if the length of the stringInput is within the low and high given. False otherwise.

    • verifyRange

      public static boolean verifyRange(int integerInput, int low)
      Method to check if the range of the input integer is more than or equal to low. No maximum high enforced.
      Parameters:
      integerInput - : The input integer to check the range of.
      low - : The minimum inclusive value the integerInput must have
      Returns:
      true if the range of the integerInput is more than or equal to low. False otherwise.

    • verifyRange

      public static boolean verifyRange(int integerInput, int low, int high)
      Method to check if the range of the input integer is between the low and high inputs.
      Parameters:
      integerInput - : The input integer to check the range of.
      low - : The minimum inclusive value the integerInput must have
      high - : The maximum inclusive value the integerInput must have
      Returns:
      true if the range of the integerInput is within the low and high given. False otherwise.

    • getAttackTypes

      public static edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList getAttackTypes(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor target, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, String direction)
      Determines the performable Attack Actions by the Actor by checking whether the Actor has a performable skill. A normal AttackAction if no Skill and a SpecialAttackAction if it does have a Skill. If the Actor can perform an AreaAttack, it can perform an AreaAttackAction skill instead. Will either uses WeaponItem or IntrinsicWeapon based on whether attacking actor has a Weapon or not.
      Parameters:
      target - : The target of the attack.
      otherActor - : The Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - : String representing the direction of the other Actor
      Returns:
      an ActionList of performable attack actions, eg: AttackAction, AreaAttackAction, QuickStepAction or SpecialAttackAction.

    • getRunes

      public static Runes getRunes(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
      Static method to obtain the Runes object from the Actor's inventory.
      Parameters:
      actor - : The Actor carrying Runes.
      Returns:
      the Runes Item from the Actor inventory.

    • getFlask

      public static FlaskOfCrimsonTears getFlask(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)

      Returns:
